name: Resentin
description: Resentin is the name in Venetian dialect of a action to do after drink an espresso coffe, you need only an espresso and a little bit of grappa.
directions: Drink and enjoy your cup of espresso coffe.
At the end your cup remain dirt of coffe and sugar, so you can clean it putting some grappa in your cup shake it then drink.
If your cup is not clean you can repeat until the process until the cup is perfect clean.
